description: Stops creating a solution version that is in a state of CREATE_PENDING or CREATE IN_PROGRESS. Depending on the current state of the solution version, the solution version state changes as follows: You are billed for all of the training completed up until you stop the solution version creation. You cannot resume creating a solution version once it has been stopped.

parameters.name: solutionVersionArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the solution version you want to stop creating.
